name: analyze_remediation_tool
description: PDF accessibility remediation tool that processes entire PDF documents to identify structural elements, apply PDF/UA tags, and generate Section 508 compliant output. Supports correlation-guided tagging when a content spine is provided, with fallback to full vision model analysis.

pdf_path.description: S3 URI to the PDF document to remediate

title.description: Document title for PDF metadata (default: 'Accessible Document')

dpi.description: Render DPI for page image analysis (default: 150)

correlation_uri.description: S3 URI to correlation XML content spine for guided element resolution

aws_profile.description: Optional AWS profile name for Bedrock authentication

result.description: Remediation result containing tagged PDF path, analysis, and accessibility report

output_pdf.description: Local path to the tagged PDF output

correlation_used.description: Whether correlation data was used for tagging

accessibility_report.description: Pre and post remediation compliance audit

s3_output_uri.description: S3 URI of the uploaded tagged PDF (when OUTPUT_BUCKET is configured)

s3_report_uri.description: S3 URI of the uploaded accessibility report JSON
